com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Interface SpenFlickListener


  • public interface SpenFlickListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for Pen flick events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DIRECTION_LEFT
      Left flick.
      static int DIRECTION_RIGHT
      Right flick.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onFlick(int direction)
      Called when a Pen flick event occurs.

    • Field Detail

      • DIRECTION_LEFT

        static final int DIRECTION_LEFT
        Left flick.
        See Also:
        #setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc, boolean, int, float), Constant Field Values

      • DIRECTION_RIGHT

        static final int DIRECTION_RIGHT
        Right flick.
        See Also:
        #setPageDoc(SpenPageDoc, boolean, int, float), Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • onFlick

        boolean onFlick(int direction)
        Called when a Pen flick event occurs.
        Parameters:
        direction - The flick direction. The valid values are DIRECTION_LEFT, and DIRECTION_RIGHT. For more information, see Field Detail in this class.
